location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant M. Donald, to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Donald writes to inform Bruce, from his position on board his vessel in the Bushire Roads, that he is sending ashore 200 bags of dates, because of a hole in his hull below the waterline. Donald writes that having unloaded the dates the hole is now above the waterline, enabling his crew to carry out repairs.
